name: Eiffel Tower
description: Visit the iconic Eiffel Tower and enjoy the view of Paris from the top.
location: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France

name: Louvre Museum
description: Explore the world's largest art museum and see famous works of art like the Mona Lisa.

name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
description: Visit the famous cathedral and see the beautiful stained glass windows.
location: 6 Parvis Notre-Dame - Pl. Jean-Paul II, 75004 Paris, France

name: Montmartre
description: Explore the historic district of Montmartre and visit the famous Sacré-Cœur Basilica.

name: Seine River Cruise
description: Take a relaxing cruise along the Seine River and see the sights of Paris from the water.
location: Port de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris, France
